intro: The Ultimate Puzzle Match, now Enhanced
description:
Enter a newly enhanced dimension of puzzle challenge when world-renowned Tetris® and Japan’s beloved Puyo Puyo series blend their legendary gameplay in the ultimate puzzle match. Stack, chain, and combo your way to victory in traditional Puyo Puyo and Tetris… or mix them together in this unique crossover.

- Brand-new Puyo Tetris® Doubles Mode: Compete in 2v2 battles with pairs using a single board to pull off devastating combos.

-Experience a multi-dimensional story in the extensive Adventure mode or compete with friends and family in a bounty of competitive local and online modes featuring support for up to 4 players.

-An absolutely packed roster of 40 playable characters, including Sonic the Hedgehog, each with their own unique stats and abilities you can carry with you into the robust, RPG-inspired Skill Battle mode.
